segments.text: Do you have any seat preference , madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , could you please put me in the non-smoking section ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like a window seat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , if any one is available . But not over the wing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , there is no window seat in the non-smoking room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't matter , I will take an aisle seat .
segments.speaker: S2
